bug.author: wqh17101
bug.description: in MatchZoo/matchzoo/inputs/point_generator.py line 290ï¼Œthere is a undefined var 'randomly' which cause NameError: global name 'randomly' is not defined

comments.comment:
And i set it False,it can work now. i try to run anmm.it seems that everything is ok at the beginning. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26429138/41696752-4ceee050-7548-11e8-9eb1-47d15c1758e1.png></denchmark-link>
But some epochs latter,it didnt work. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26429138/41696792-7d63b148-7548-11e8-9523-23ae1cf41aa0.png></denchmark-link>
every model which uses DRMM_PointGenerator has this problem.
It's really a bug in data generation. Thanks for your help. The DRMM_PointGenerator is used under classification task (i.e., QuoraQP) by DRMM and ANMM. I will fixed it right now.
